entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming south 20 near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
